Veiled Strike.name: Veiled Strike
Veiled Strike.flavor: You imbue your weapon with the essence of shadow, unleashing it as an inky cloud that quickly surrounds you.
Veiled Strike.effect: You create a zone in a close burst 2 that lasts until the end of your next turn. For all creatures except you, the zone blocks line of sight and is totally obscured.

Maelstrom of Darkness.name: Maelstrom of Darkness
Maelstrom of Darkness.flavor: With a sweep of your weapon, you call down the darkness of the Shadowfell to surround you and scour your foes.
Maelstrom of Darkness.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. For all creatures except you, the zone blocks line of sight and is totally obscured.
Maelstrom of Darkness.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Veiled Eyes.name: Veiled Eyes
Veiled Eyes.flavor: You close your eyes and expand your senses to engage foes that you could not otherwise perceive.
Veiled Eyes.effect: You assume the veiled eyes stance. Until the stance ends, you have blindsight 3 and immunity to gaze attacks. You cannot see any creature or object outside your blindsightâ€™s range. You can end the stance as a free action.
